title: Positive Kerning??
content:
I was told that positive kerning is not supported in some programs. Can anyone shed some light on this subject. I would greatly appreciate it. It may only be sign making programs that do not accept positive kerning.

Thanks,

-Charles

[www.borgeslettering.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20130821061248/http:/www.borgeslettering.com/ "www.borgeslettering.com")
author: Charles_borges_...
